headline: Xata Workers: client-side database access without client-side secrets
keywords: Developer Week, Cloudflare Workers, Workers for Platforms, Serverless, Developers
description: Xata is on a mission to solve the industry’s hardest data problems with their Serverless Data Platform. We’re excited to have Xata building their serverless functions product – Xata Workers – on top of Workers for Platforms. Here is Xata’s story.
